#### Insights here:

This article is yet to be completed. Please check back later!

Dr. Kerry Muhlestein - on his episode of the Church History Matters Podcast - notes an interesting parallel between this parable and an ancient Egyptian story about Osiris called Setna II.  The overall story structure is similar, with the role of Osiris being replaced by Abraham.  It is possible Jesus learned this story in His youth as He and His parents lived in Egypt after being forced to flee. <br>
